alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:58PM CDT until April 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Southern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 758 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Homer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homer, Farmerville, Bernice, Cooley, Dubach, Athens, Lisbon, Spearsville, Lillie, Holly Springs, Mount Zion, Aycock, Spring Lake, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Lake Clairborne, Corinth, Shiloh and Unionville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
